r.s: Provides a POP3 class to access POP3 server.
r.d: Provides a POP3 class to access POP3 server. Support all POP3 commands including UIDL listings, APOP authentication,DIGEST-MD5 and CRAM-MD5 using optional Auth_SASL package
r.n: * Fixed Bug #2440 thanks to erickoh at jobsfactory dot com * Fixed Bug #2453 :Mistake in PEAR Doc for Net_POP3 example. thanks to erickoh at jobsfactory dot com * Removed double quotes in _authLogin() fixes Bug #2454 :AUTH LOGIN user and pass need to be enclosed in double quotes?. thanks to erickoh at jobsfactory dot com * Fixed Bug #2523 : Unable to login to Qmail servers. thanks to johann dot hoehn at ecommerce dot com * Fixed Bug #2646 :APOP attempted when not supported. thanks to osdave at nospam_davepar dot com
